br.ufmg.dcc.saotome.beholder.ui

Interface Component

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Displayable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Button, Checkbox, Div, GenericComponent, IFrame, Link, RadioButton, Select, Table, TextArea, TextField

    public interface Component
extends Displayable
    Interface with the common attributes and events usually found in HTML components.
    Author:
    √çcaro Clever F. Braga (icaroclever@gmail.com)

      • loadByAttribute

        void loadByAttribute(java.lang.String tagName,
                   java.lang.String attributeName,
                   java.lang.String value)
        Load the interface element using an attribute as the unique identifier of a tag, overwriting the old object by the new one loaded. If the attribute is not unique, it loads the first match.
        Parameters:
        tagName - the tag name
        attributeName - the attribute name
        value - the attribute name value

      • getAttribute

        java.lang.String getAttribute(java.lang.String attribute)
        Recover the attribute of HTML component.
        Returns:
        attribute value

        Set the attribute of the component class.
        Parameters:
